    • Uses of Bits in mesquite.align.lib

      Methods in mesquite.align.lib that return Bits 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract Bits MultiBlockMoveBase.getWhichTaxa(boolean optionDown) 
      Methods in mesquite.align.lib with parameters of type Bits 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long[][] TwoSequenceAlignerGaps.alignSequences(long[] sequence1, long[] sequence2, boolean returnAlignment, MesquiteNumber score, CategoricalState state, boolean maintainGaps, Bits newGaps1)
      This method is not called directly by Mesquite, but modules preferring to receive and return the information as long[][] can override this and let the previous method call it.
      long[][] TwoSequenceAlignerGaps.alignSequences(MCategoricalDistribution data, int taxon1, int taxon2, int firstSite, int lastSite, boolean returnAlignment, MesquiteNumber score, boolean maintainGaps, Bits newGaps1)
      As a subclass of TwoSequenceAligner, the methods here have passed into them some additional arguments that ideally would be dealt with.
